projectDesc.p: "龔輿夢" is part of The Global Medieval Sourcebook, a digital compendium of medieval texts in their original languages and in English translation. This larger project comprises computer-readable transcriptions and/or editions of texts dating from the ninth to the sixteenth century, and originating in Europe, North Africa, the Middle East, and Asia; accompanied by new English translations; high-resolution digital images of manuscript/early print sources, where available; an apparatus that includes critical introductions, textual notes and annotations; and a flexible user interface with which to navigate these materials.

editorialDecl.p: Transcriptions and translations are encoded in XML conforming to TEI (P5) guidelines. The original-language text is contained within <lem> tags and translations within <rdg> tags.

interpretation.p: Texts are translated into modern English with maximum fidelity to the original text, except where it would impair comprehension or good style. Archaisms are preserved where they do not conflict with the aesthetic of the original text. Creative translation choices are marked and discussed in the critical notes.

app.rdg: There is a literatus from Tanzhou named Gong Yu.
In the winter of the fourth year of the Dao Qian reign,

app.lem: 與鄉里六七人偕赴省試.
app.rdg: he went together with six or seven people from his hometown to participate in the provincial exam.
When they passed by Yi Chun,
they paid respects to the Yangshan Monastery and prayed for dreams.

app.lem: 輿夢至官府, 見柱上掲紙一片,
app.rdg: Gong Yu dreamt he went into the government house and saw a piece of paper on the pillar of the house.

On the paper the four characters of “Gong Yu Bu De”
meaning, “Gong Yu will not get it”
were written.
But the upper part and the lower part of the character “Ge” were not connected.

app.lem: 旣覺, 殊不樂, 自意必下第.
app.rdg: When Gong Yu woke up, he was rather unhappy and thought he would fail the exam.

app.lem: 及春榜至, 輿中選, 餘人盡黜,
app.rdg: When the results came out in the spring, (it turns out) Gong Yu was selected and the rest of his group were all rejected.

app.lem: 始以語人, 謂夢不驗.
app.rdg: Gong Yu then began to tell people, saying the dream was not accurate.

app.lem: 好事者曰: “不字斷續如此, 乃一个也. 神言龔輿一个得耳, 豈不昭然?”
app.rdg: The acquaintances said: “When the character ‘Ge’ were disconnected like this, it should be read as two characters ‘Yi Ge.’ The deity said only Gong Yu himself could get it, isn’t this obvious?”
